name: Rosso Corsa
description: Rosso Corsa is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red color and advanced technology, it stands out among its peers. Its cat-like buttons add a touch of playfulness to its design. Equipped with versatile arms and legs that can be positioned in a hand-down manner, Rosso Corsa is capable of precise movements and intricate tasks. Its screen, powered by a laser, enhances its visual capabilities, allowing it to analyze and display complex data with ease.
